an1.198-208:4.1: “The foremost of my monk disciples in creating a mind-made body is Cūḷapanthaka.
an1.198-208:5.1: … who is skilled in the evolution of consciousness is Cūḷapanthaka.
an1.198-208:6.1: … who is skilled in the evolution of perception is Cūḷapanthaka.
an1.198-208:7.1: … who live without conflict is Subhūti.
an1.198-208:8.1: … who is worthy of a teacher’s offering is Subhūti.
an1.198-208:9.1: … who stay in the wilderness is Revata of the Acacia Wood.
an1.198-208:11.1: … who are energetic is Soṇa Koḷivisa.
an1.198-208:12.1: … who are good speakers is Soṇa Kuṭikaṇṇa.
an1.198-208:13.1: … who receive many possessions is Sīvali.
an1.198-208:14.1: … who are strong in faith is Vakkalī.”
